top_5_insights.evidence: r=+0.89 (p=0.001), R²=0.80, validated across 9 network models
top_5_insights.novelty: First empirical validation of Jost & Liu (2011) theoretical prediction

top_5_insights.insight: Configuration nulls are MORE hyperbolic than real networks
top_5_insights.impact: Reveals clustering as protective mechanism against extreme geometry

top_5_insights.insight: Semantic networks RESIST Ricci flow equilibrium
top_5_insights.evidence: ΔC=-80-87%, Δκ=+0.17-0.25 in 30-41 steps, NOT at equilibrium
top_5_insights.novelty: First test of Ricci equilibrium hypothesis in cognitive networks
top_5_insights.impact: New framework: Cognitive optimization ≠ Geometric optimization

top_5_insights.novelty: First predictive model for curvature from network properties
top_5_insights.impact: Enables curvature estimation without expensive computation

top_5_insights.evidence: 3/3 languages show same patterns (CV<0.20 for all effects)

gaps_filled.gap: Configuration null model NEVER applied to semantic networks
gaps_filled.contribution: First separation of topology vs semantics in curvature

gaps_filled.gap: Ricci flow NEVER applied to cognitive networks
gaps_filled.contribution: First test of equilibrium hypothesis in semantics

gaps_filled.gap: No predictive model for network curvature
Cognitive vs geometric optimization never compared

data_insights.finding: ASYMMETRIC null distribution with light tails

rationale: Novel methods (first config nulls + Ricci flow in semantics)
publication_strategy.narrative: Clustering as universal modulator of semantic geometry
publication_strategy.key_angle: Counter-intuitive finding: clustering PROTECTS against extreme hyperbolic geometry
publication_strategy.justification: REALISTIC estimate based on: (1) 3 high-impact findings, (2) solid validation (M=1000, 9 models), (3) honest limitations (3 languages, 1 dataset)

essential_figures.title: Clustering-Curvature Relationship
essential_figures.content: Scatter plot: 9 models (ER, WS×5, BA, Config, Real) with C-κ regression line

essential_figures.title: Configuration Null Distributions
essential_figures.content: Violin plots: 3 languages, null distributions vs real κ

essential_figures.title: Ricci Flow Trajectories
essential_figures.content: Time series: C and κ evolution for 3 languages

key_limitations.impact: Moderate - but all 3 show consistent patterns (mitigates concern)
key_limitations.future_work: Expand to 10+ languages from diverse families

key_limitations.impact: Moderate - but SWOW is gold-standard for semantic networks
key_limitations.future_work: Validate with other semantic datasets (WordNet, ConceptNet)

key_limitations.impact: Low - OR curvature is most established for networks
key_limitations.future_work: Compare with Forman-Ricci and other measures

key_limitations.impact: Low - semantic networks are relatively stable
key_limitations.future_work: Track curvature evolution during language acquisition

cross_domain_connections.connection: Ricci flow used to study brain connectivity (Sizemore 2019)

cross_domain_connections.opportunity: Test clustering moderation in social graphs
Use predictive formula to optimize embeddings

unexpected_discoveries.expectation: Nulls should be less structured → less hyperbolic
unexpected_discoveries.reality: Destroying clustering EXPOSES maximal hyperbolic geometry
unexpected_discoveries.explanation: Real networks use clustering to MODERATE extreme geometry
Clustering is PRIMARY driver of curvature

unexpected_discoveries.discovery: Semantic networks FAR from Ricci equilibrium
unexpected_discoveries.reality: 80-87% clustering reduction needed to reach equilibrium

theoretical_implications.implication: Clustering as curvature modulator is UNIVERSAL principle
theoretical_implications.impact: Generalizable to any network with clustering

theoretical_implications.implication: Semantic networks are COGNITIVELY optimized, not GEOMETRICALLY optimized
theoretical_implications.impact: New framework for understanding network organization

theoretical_implications.implication: Hyperbolic geometry is EMERGENT from degree heterogeneity, MODERATED by clustering
theoretical_implications.impact: Reveals two-factor model of network geometry

practical_applications.benefit: Optimize embedding quality for NLP tasks

practical_applications.method: Compare real networks to config nulls
